attributes.action: stop using the term police staff in government statisitics and distinguishe between PCSOS and Police Officers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The term police staff includes both Police Community Support Officers and Police Officers. I feel a more accurate measurement whould break down the figures into both PCSOs and Police Officers. The government claims it has record police staff but this includes PCSOs who have less powers.
